text:
The sister of the Duchess of Cambridge married millionaire Mr Matthews in front of about 150 guests at St Mark's Church in Englefield, Berkshire. After the 11:30am service, the wedding party moved to the now Mrs Matthews' parents house in Bucklebury for the reception. Pippa Middleton became known as one of the world's most famous bridesmaids from her sister's wedding in 2011. She was joined by her sister Kate and her royal neice and nephew Prince George and Princess Charlotte. They wore dusky pink and pale green ensembles. Actress Meghan Markle, Prince Harry's girlfriend, was missing from the ceremony, but later arrived at the reception, just in time for a Spitfire flypast at sunset.

Pippa Middleton's wedding – in pictures Sat, May 20, 2017 See all the pictures from Pippa Middleton's wedding here. Play slideshow 1 of 78

In case you missed all the live coverage of the wedding of the year. Below are all the best pictures and updates as the day unfolded for Pippa Middleton and new husband James Matthews. Monday, May 22 5pm: The extravagant celebrations are estimated to have cost more than £1 million, although thanks to some generous friends her family didn’t have to foot the full bill. The couple started their day with champagne, plus a game of table tennis with Roger Federer before their big day kicked off. 3pm Pippa’s ‘reception dress’ was reportedly a white flowing dress made by the designer Pronovias, which is known for its range of gowns in different styles. It is rumoured that the slinky dress had a thigh-high slit, which would have enabled her to take to the dance floor. Pronovias has a shop in Bond Street, which runs by a request appointment service only. 2pm Pippa and James are reported to be at Los Angeles Airport on the way to their luxurious honeymoon. They will arrive later today at their destination of Tetiaroa, which was once owned by Marlon Brando. The newly-weds were seen chatting with their fellow passengers at Los Angeles International Airport. 1pm The guests may still be recovering from the raucous party as it is revealed that the bash ended at around 4am. It is now also known that a fleet of 50 Land Rovers carried guests from a security check area to the main celebrations. There was a portable Table Tennis table in the marquee, but it isn't known if Wimbledon champion Roger Federer played to show off his skills. 12pm The reports are that 'Party Animal' Prince Harry was on best behaviour at the wedding and he left with his girlfriend, Meghan Markle in the early hours of Sunday morning to return to Kensington Palace. On Sunday, Miss Markle was photographed wearing a baseball cap in the back of a taxi. 11am The wedding was made as elegant as possible as Pippa chose a company that had models as waiters. Pippa had reportedly personally vetted all the waiters and waitresses and all of the staff were forced to sign confidentiality agreements and had to give up their phones before entering the site. The waiters were from the catering company Table Talk. It appears that Pippa's ban of social media at the reception worked as no pictures of inside the marquee have emerged. 10am James Matthews’ best man Justin Johansen compared Pippa to a dog in his best man speech. He said: “Now to the love of James' life: beautiful, energetic, loyal, soft-mouthed, comes on command, great behind. But that is enough about Jame's spaniel, Rafa, I'm here to talk about James' love, Pippa.” He also spoke about her famous bottom with a message from her trainer telling the bride to not forget her "buttock clench on the star jumps". 9am Pictures have emerged of inside St Mark's Church in Englefield where Pippa Middleton walked down the aisle with her father, Michael to marry James Matthews. She was watched by 150 of her friends and family as well as royalty and celebrities. Following the church ceremony, the guests enjoyed a wedding reception in Pippa's parents family estate in Bucklebury. 8am The staff serving food and drink at Saturday’s wedding were all understood to be models. Miss Middleton’s careful choreography ­extended to the table plan, which decreed that couples should not sit together. The bawdy best man was said to have stepped over the mark as details emerge about the reception. James Matthews' best man is said to have made crude punchlines about sex and made a lewd gag about the couple's honeymoon at the evening reception on Saturday. It was claimed Justin Johannsen, a long-time friend of Mr Matthews, stepped up to the mic at 11.30pm after a five-course dinner and started with tributes to guests but then compared the bride to a 'dog' which left the room with an awkward silence.

GETTY•WIREIMAGE Pippa Middleton has arrived at the Berkshire church

Sunday, May 21 5pm There is now speculation as to who will be the next couple to be engaged; will it be Donna Air and James Middleton? Or, will there be a Prince Harry and Meghan Markle engagement? 3pm The menu last night included haggis, foie gras and King prawns. Pippa’s former employee Table Talk was in charge of the food and feeding the 300 guests. 2pm There are reports that tennis super star Roger Federer enjoyed a game of table tennis during the wedding last night. The wedding has caught the eye of the world and has received global coverage. 12:30pm Although the lucky guests may be nursing their hangovers from last night’s lavish celebrations, they won't be discovering any embarrassing selfies on social media as guests were banned from using their mobile phones. 9am The reports are that Pippa Middleton and James Matthews's honeymoon will be in French Polynesia, on a private island once owned by Marlon Brando. Former US president Barack Obama reportedly touched down a few weeks ago to begin his White House memoirs. Saturday, May 20 11pm A vintage World War 11 spitfire entertained guests with a spectacular flypast above Pippa’s parents home in Berkshire. Neighbours say that they had been warned about the flypast by the Middletons. 10:30pm It seems that Prince Harry left the wedding ceremony to go and pick up her love interest Meghan Markle and bring her back to the party in Bucklebury. The Prince had a round-trip of 100 miles to ensure his girlfriend could attend the bash of the year. Hilarious memes had appeared on Twitter as fans speculated as to why Meghan Markle was not at the ceremony. Piers Morgan said the only reason he was interested in the nuptials was to see "what Meghan Markle wore".

BACKGRID Inside St Mark's Church where Pippa married James

FynetPictures Guests enjoyed a spitfire display during the celebrations

10pm It has emerged that Pippa wore the same drop diamond earrings that she wore as a bridesmaid when her sister Kate married Prince William in 2011. 9.40pm Reports emerge over Meghan Markle being spotted at the reception with Prince Harry. 8.40pm About 350 high-profile guests are believed to be at the reception at Carol and Michael Middleton's home on Pease Hill. 8.20pm Guests gushed over the wedding as they began arriving at the reception. A guest, who did not wish to be named, said: "They looked really happy. It was a wonderful ceremony. They were clearly very much in love." 7.30pm Fans of the Royal family are desperately seeking pictures of Meghan Markle at the wedding reception as hilarious memes emerge on Twitter. There is no sign of the Suits actress yet. 6.30pm All eyes are peeled for Meghan Markle, who is currently in the UK, after Prince Harry was spotted leaving the wedding party in his car. It is believed he has gone to collect his girlfriend for the evening party.

FlynetPictures The happy couple leave the church after the ceremony

Flynet Pictures Fans wave the couple off as they leave the church

GETTY The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge after the Royal wedding in a vintage car

The newly-married couple leave the church venue in Englefield with thier loyal fans wishing them well. As groom James drives the classic car, they both wave at the cameras looking excited for the evening ahead.

Samir Hussein/WireImage Prince George leaves the wedding

Getty The newly-married couple leave the church

PA Prince Harry leaves the church with the other guests

PA Prince George and the other page boys and flower girls

Samir Hussein/WireImage The wedding party leave the church before the reception in Bucklebury

3.35pm The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge drove down The Mall in a vintage Aston Martin when they wed in 2011, with William behind the wheel of the motor, deocrated with 'L' plates, blue and red ribbons and balloons trailing behind. The car, which belongs to father Prince Charles, was finished with a 'JUST WED' number plate. 3.30pm Pippa and James are seen driving from St Mark's Church in a vintage convertible sports car. The pair waved to crowds in scenes reminiscent of sister Kate, the Duchess of Cambridge, when she married Prince William in 2011. 1:30pm Prince Harry leaves the church while talking to the other guests. 1:20pm Prince George poses outside the church with the other flower girls and page boys. 1pm The newly-married couple have a kiss in the arch of the church with the six children in front of them and the Duchess of Cambridge behind them. They are also photographed with David Matthews, the father of the groom. 12:50pm Pippa and James leave the church and give their fans a wave with the rest of the guests behind them. 12:05pm The Duchess of Cambridge is wearing a nude dress and is pictured fixing Pippa's dress, like her sister did for her at the Royal Wedding six years ago.

PA James and his father, David Matthews with Pippa

Samir Hussein/WireImage Pippa and James kiss when they leave the church

PA Pippa Middleton and James Matthews leave the Englefield church

The wedding reportedly has cost £300,000. 12pm Bridesmaid Princess Charlotte and page boy Prince George arrive at the wedding, Kate has let on that she hopes her children behave themselves today. All bridesmaid and page boy outfits are by Pepa & Co.

Getty Pippa Middleton moments before the ceremony in her Giles Deacon dress

Afp Kate stands with her daughter Princess Charlotte

Reuters Pippa arrived at the church in a classic car with her father

PA Kate fixes Pippa's dress before she enters the church

11:37am The first pictures emerge of the bride arriving at the church with her father, Michael. Pippa Middleton's dress was showed to the world for the first time - a beautiful bespoke wedding dress, designed by Giles Deacon. Prince Harry's girlfriend, Meghan Markle appears to be missing.

Samir Hussein/WireImage Page Boy Prince George and Princess Charlotte attend the wedding

Afp/getty Pippa Middleton arrives with her father Michael to her wedding

11:35am Groom James Matthews is pictured by the church with the brother of the bride, James Middleton. 11:30am Prince Harry and the Duke of Cambridge walk up to the church for the wedding. They are dressed in dark morning suits, waistcoats and ties. 11:25am Princess Eugenie arrives at the wedding dressed in a double-strap, navy blue dress and a yellow hat.

Getty Carole Middleton arrives with her son James

FlynetPictures James Matthews and James Middleton arrive at the church

Getty Prince Harry and the Duke of Cambridge arrive at the church

11:20am Swiss tennis player Roger Federer and his wife Mirka are hand in hand as they arrive at the wedding. Pippa Middleton is often spotted watching tennis at Wimbledon where Roger has triumphed seven times.

Getty Princess Eugenie wearing a stunning blue dress arrives at the venue

Getty Swiss tennis player Roger Federer and his wife Mirka attend the wedding

11:15am Guests are arriving to the Englefield church dressed colourfully and with flamboyant hats. 11:10am Best man Spencer Matthews, who found fame on Made In Chelsea, greets Donna Air who is dressed in yellow before the wedding begins. 11am Spencer Matthews, James's brother has arrived at the church looking suave. He is the best man today and has been told to give a 'toned down' best man's speech.

Samir Hussein/WireImage Guests arrive for the wedding dressed colourfully

Samir Hussein/WireImage Spencer greets Donna Air, James Middleton's girlfriend, before the wedding begins

10:50am Gary Goldsmith has tweeted pictures of himself going to the wedding. He is the younger brother of Carole Middleton and is known as the ‘rogue’ uncle for giving interviews to Hello! Magazine amid other mishaps, he reportedly spends half the year in Ibiza. He has broken the social media ban by tweeting about the wedding. 10:40am The first guests have arrived at the church with the lady wearing a white flowery dress and a flamboyant, feathered fascinator and the man wearing a morning suit.

Samir Hussein/WireImage Spencer Matthews arrives at the church

Proud Dad x off we go pic.twitter.com/e42TFTVSDh — Gary Goldsmith (@garygoldsmith65) May 20, 2017

10:20am The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have left Kensington Palce for Pippa Middleton's wedding. The Duchess wore a pretty peach hat and elegant drop earrings, while William can be seen in a white shirt and a purple tie. 10:10am Police are outside the church ready to keep the private ceremony safe. The staff working at the wedding are not answering any questions put to them by the media and are keeping it all a closely-guarded secret.

PA The first guests have arrived to the ceremony

Flynet The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have left Kensington Palace for the wedding

Getty Members of the public arrive to wish the famous couple well

A crowd of supporters have appeared outside the church, with some coming as far as the United States for the big event. 10am Photos emerge of broadcasters outside the church ready to catch any glimpse they can of the wedding guests, due to arrive before the 11:30am service.

GETTY The security operation has been planned for weeks

PA Media outside the church in Berkshire

A temporary glass marquee has been built on Michael and Carole Middleton’s land to host the party guests. The bride's nephew and niece, Prince George and Princess Charlotte, will be page boy and flower girl. A guest at a Buckingham Palace garden party, Andrew Bates, said the Duchess of Cambridge was nervous about how her children would behave.

GETTY Meghan Markle is set to attend with Prince Harry
title: Pippa Middleton wedding: In case you missed it...Pippa marries in lace with Kate & Meghan

meta_data.description: PIPPA Middleton tied the knot with her hedge fund boyfriend James Matthews in a private wedding dubbed the 'society event of the year', with Meghan Markle arriving for the evening reception on the arm of Prince Harry.
